module.name: hotplug
module.summary: Policy for hotplug system, for supporting the connection and disconnection of devices at runtime.

interface.name: hotplug_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute hotplug with a domain transition.

interface.name: hotplug_exec
interface.summary: Execute hotplug in the caller domain.

interface.name: hotplug_use_fds
interface.summary: Inherit and use hotplug file descriptors.

interface.name: hotplug_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to inherit hotplug file descriptors.

interface.name: hotplug_dontaudit_search_config
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the hotplug configuration directories.

interface.name: hotplug_getattr_config_dirs
interface.summary: Get the attributes of the hotplug configuration directory.

interface.name: hotplug_read_config
interface.summary: Read the configuration files for hotplug.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
